channel.title: PowerShell on River's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in PowerShell on River's Notes

item.title: PowerShell Run as Another User & Elevate the Process
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description: When you have UAC enabled, most of the time, the default PowerShell ISE is opened with normal process. This is not going to work when you want to apply the DSC resources. Have to have an administrative PowerShell process running to get it done.

item.title: Ternary Operator in PowerShell
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description:
I’m very noob .Net C# developer, but I remember this:

1
2

<compare> ? <value of true> : <value of false>
(a == ‘a’ ) ? 1 : 2

item.title: PowerShell - Multidimensional Arrays in PowerShell
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description:
You may have some arrays like this:

1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8

$year1 = @()
$year1 += "Cindy"
$year1 += "Candy"
$year1 += "Mandy"
$year2 = @()
$year2 += "Chris"
$year2 += "Green"
$year2 += "Richard"

item.title: How to Convert String to Base64 and Vice Versa Using Powershell
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description: Working with Consul without UI is the correct way to go, which also help you with the productivity!!! (True?, hahaha~~)

item.title: Send Email via PowerShell
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description:
I need to send a large number (more than 100) emails to my wife for her needs.

She has a folder that contains tones pdf files, needs to be send to an email address one file per email.

item.title: Delete Content of folder Containig Files With Open File Handles Using Powershell
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description: When removing a folder, and it complains the files in the folder are in used, how to ignore the error and force them to be removed?

item.title: PowerShell Simple Retry Logic
item.author: river@ryc.one (River Yang)
item.description:
Well, this is quite a dirty fix for anything not stable…

First time failed? Run second time, failed? Third time again… Only exits successful or retried more than 3 times.
